text:
Created attachment 24567
Patch to replace direct array access with getters

HexUtils has two public static arrays which ought to be immutable.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: Thanks for the patch. It wasn't quite complete. I added the extra changes required.
creator: markt@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
